name: Ah, Nuts!
description:
Controls: Tap space to jump, hold space to jump higher. Double jumping is free for the first jump, every consecutive jump after will cost you acorns! (Game is mobile compatible)

Collect as many acorns as possible before the world spins you off in this take on the endless runner genre of games. 

Thank you for playing and make sure to post your score in the comments. I would love to know what is possible! 

This game was created for the Black and White Jam #8.
